title: Alien: Isolation
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Russian.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Discover the true meaning of fear in Alien: Isolation, a survival horror set in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger. Fifteen years after the events of Alien™, Ellen Ripley’s daughter, Amanda enters a desperate battle for survival, on a mission to unravel the truth behind her mother's disappearance.  As Amanda, you will navigate through an increasingly volatile world as you find yourself confronted on all sides by a panicked, desperate population and an unpredictable, ruthless Alien.  Underpowered and underprepared, you must scavenge resources, improvise solutions and use your wits, not just to succeed in your mission, but to simply stay alive.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation CGI Trailer - Improvise
childDownloads.description: Hack systems, scavenge for vital resources and craft items to deal with each situation. Will you evade your enemies, distract them or face them head on?

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation - Survival pack
childDownloads.description: Check out these awesome new free gamer pics from Alien: Isolation!

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation - How will you survive pack?
childDownloads.description: Check out these awesome new free gamer pics from Alien: Isolation!

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation - Launch Trailer - Arrival
childDownloads.description: Nominated for over 50 major gaming awards, including winner of Polygon's 'Editor's Choice E3 2014' and The Escapist's 'Best of E3 2014' awards, Alien: Isolation looks to redefine the survival-horror genre with its uniquely challenging, AI-driven Alien creating one of the most unpredictable and ruthless videogame enemies of all time.  Discover the true meaning of fear in Alien: Isolation, a survival horror set in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger. Fifteen years after the events of Alien™, Ellen Ripley’s daughter, Amanda enters a desperate battle for survival, on a mission to unravel the truth behind her mother's disappearance.  Underpowered and underprepared, you must scavenge resources, improvise solutions and use your wits, not just to succeed in your mission, but to simply stay alive.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation - Corporate Lockdown
childDownloads.description: Welcome to Corporate Lockdown, the first expansion pack for Alien: Isolation.  This pack features three all-new maps:for Survivor Mode, a time-based challenge to test your skills.	Can you evade the Alien for long enough to survive or will you try to take the Alien head-on?  - Three new maps, stretching from the Corporate Penthouse to the Medlabs. - New playable character Ransome gives you the firepower to take the fight to your enemies. - Upload your best times to the Alien: Isolation leaderboards and challenge the world.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation - Trauma
childDownloads.description: If you own Alien: Isolation Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again.  Welcome to Trauma, the second add-on content pack for Alien: Isolation.  This pack features three all-new maps for Survivor Mode, a time-based challenge to test your skills.  Face off against a range of enemies across the medical bays of Sevastopol station.  Will you evade, distract or confront them?  You'll have to act fast if you want to survive.  - Three new maps, including a claustrophobic scramble through the Sevastopol vents. - Play as Chief Medical Officer Lingard and get faster access to Medikits and distraction IEDs. - Destroy any trace of your research and save the survivors on the station.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation Crew Expendable Bonus Content
childDownloads.description: This additional content sees the original crew reunited aboard the Nostromo. Brett and Kane are dead; alongside Ash and Lambert, it is now down to you as Dallas, Parker or Ellen Ripley, to find a way to isolate the Alien and overcome the terror that confronts them.  Alien: Isolation is a first-person survival horror game capturing the fear and tension evoked by Ridley Scott’s 1979 classic film. Players find themselves in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger as an unpredictable, ruthless Xenomorph is stalking and killing deep in the shadows. Underpowered and underprepared, you must scavenge resources, improvise solutions and use your wits, not just to succeed in your mission, but to simply stay alive.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation Last Survivor Bonus Content
childDownloads.description: As Ellen Ripley, it is down to you to complete the last mission on board the Nostromo. The rest of the crew are dead. In a desperate bid to survive you must set the ship’s self-destruct and attempt to reach the escape shuttle.  Alien: Isolation is a first-person survival horror game capturing the fear and tension evoked by Ridley Scott’s 1979 classic film. Players find themselves in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger as an unpredictable, ruthless Xenomorph is stalking and killing deep in the shadows. Underpowered and underprepared, you must scavenge resources, improvise solutions and use your wits, not just to succeed in your mission, but to simply stay alive.

childDownloads.title: Alien: Isolation Season Pass
childDownloads.description: REQUIRES ALIEN: ISOLATION FOR XBOX 360, SOLD SEPARATELY. Alien: Isolation Season Pass includes the listed game content at a discounted rate over individual purchases. If you own this Season Pass , all content should be accessed through the in-game store AND NOT DOWNLOADED FROM Xbox Store or you will be charged twice. Purchase the Alien: Isolation Season Pass to get access to five add on packs at up to 25% discount! All Season Pass add on content packs are scheduled to be released by March 2015, and will give you access to new maps and characters to take on the Survivor Mode challenge.   Save money on Survivor Mode add on content for this game by purchasing the Season pass.
